001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa;
002
003import com.google.common.eventbus.Subscribe;
004import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.GradeBook;
005import edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.gradebook.Student;
006import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach;
007import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
008import org.mockito.ArgumentCaptor;
009
010import java.time.LocalDateTime;
011import java.util.Arrays;
012
013import static edu.pdx.cs410J.grader.poa.StudentsView.SelectStudentHandler;
014import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
015import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.equalTo;
016import static org.mockito.Mockito.*;
017
018public class StudentsPresenterTest extends POASubmissionTestCase {
019
020  private StudentsView view;
021  private GradeBook book;
022  private Student student0;
023  private Student student1;
024  private Student student2;
025
026  @Override
027  @BeforeEach
028  public void setUp() {
029    super.setUp();
030
031    this.view = mock(StudentsView.class);
032    new StudentsPresenter(this.bus, this.view);
033
034    this.book = new GradeBook("Test Grade Book");
035
036    student0 = new Student("0").setFirstName("First0").setLastName("Last0").setEmail("email0@mail.com");
037    book.addStudent(student0);
038    student1 = new Student("1").setFirstName("First1").setLastName("Last1").setEmail("email1@mail.com");
039    book.addStudent(student1);
040    student2 = new Student("2").setFirstName("First2").setLastName("Last2").setEmail("email2@mail.com");
041    book.addStudent(student2);
042
043  }
044
045  @Test
046  public void viewIsPopulatedWhenGradeBookLoaded() {
047    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
048
049    verify(this.view).setStudents(Arrays.asList("<unknown student>", "First0 Last0 <email0@mail.com>", "First1 Last1 <email1@mail.com>", "First2 Last2 <email2@mail.com>"));
050  }
051
052  @Test
053  public void studentsAreListedInAlphabeticalOrderByLastName() {
054    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("Test In Alphabetical Order");
055    book.addStudent(new Student("4").setFirstName("First1").setLastName("Last1").setEmail("email1@mail.com"));
056    book.addStudent(new Student("3").setFirstName("First3").setLastName("Last3").setEmail("email3@mail.com"));
057    book.addStudent(new Student("1").setFirstName("First2").setLastName("Last2").setEmail("email2@mail.com"));
058
059    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
060
061    verify(this.view).setStudents(Arrays.asList("<unknown student>", "First1 Last1 <email1@mail.com>", "First2 Last2 <email2@mail.com>", "First3 Last3 <email3@mail.com>"));
062  }
063
064  @Test
065  public void firstStudentIsSelectedWhenGradeBookLoaded() {
066    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
067
068    verify(this.view).setSelectedStudentIndex(0);
069  }
070
071  @Test
072  public void selectingStudentInViewFiresStudentSelectedEvent() {
073    ArgumentCaptor<SelectStudentHandler> viewHandler = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(SelectStudentHandler.class);
074    verify(this.view).addSelectStudentHandler(viewHandler.capture());
075
076    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
077    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
078
079    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
080
081    viewHandler.getValue().studentSelected(2);
082
083    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
084    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
085
086    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(student1));
087  }
088
089  @Test
090  public void selectingStudentInAlphabetizedViewFiresStudentSelectedEvent() {
091    ArgumentCaptor<SelectStudentHandler> viewHandler = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(SelectStudentHandler.class);
092    verify(this.view).addSelectStudentHandler(viewHandler.capture());
093
094    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
095    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
096
097    GradeBook book = new GradeBook("Test In Alphabetical Order");
098    book.addStudent(new Student("4").setFirstName("First1").setLastName("Last1").setEmail("email1@mail.com"));
099    book.addStudent(new Student("3").setFirstName("First3").setLastName("Last3").setEmail("email3@mail.com"));
100
101    Student student2 = new Student("1").setFirstName("First2").setLastName("Last2").setEmail("email2@mail.com");
102    book.addStudent(student2);
103
104    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
105
106    viewHandler.getValue().studentSelected(2);
107
108    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
109    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
110
111    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(student2));
112  }
113
114  @Test
115  public void selectingUnknownStudentInViewFiresNullStudentSelectedEvent() {
116    ArgumentCaptor<SelectStudentHandler> viewHandler = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(SelectStudentHandler.class);
117    verify(this.view).addSelectStudentHandler(viewHandler.capture());
118
119    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
120    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
121
122    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(book));
123
124    viewHandler.getValue().studentSelected(0);
125
126    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
127    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
128
129    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(null));
130  }
131
132  private interface StudentSelectedEventHandler {
133    @Subscribe
134    void handle(StudentSelectedEvent event);
135  }
136
137  @Test
138  public void submissionWithMatchingStudentNameFiresStudentSelectedEvent() {
139    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
140    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
141
142    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(this.book));
143
144    POASubmission submission =
145      createPOASubmission("Subject", student1.getFirstName() + " " + student1.getLastName() + " <wrong@mail.com>", LocalDateTime.now());
146    this.bus.post(new POASubmissionSelected(submission));
147
148    verify(this.view).setSelectedStudentIndex(2);
149
150    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
151    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
152
153    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(student1));
154  }
155
156  @Test
157  public void submissionWithMatchingStudentEmailFiresStudentSelectedEvent() {
158    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
159    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
160
161    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(this.book));
162
163    POASubmission submission =
164      createPOASubmission("Subject", student2.getEmail(), LocalDateTime.now());
165    this.bus.post(new POASubmissionSelected(submission));
166
167    verify(this.view).setSelectedStudentIndex(3);
168
169    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
170    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
171
172    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(student2));
173  }
174
175  @Test
176  public void submissionByNonMatchingStudentFiresUnknownStudentSelectedEvent() {
177    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
178    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
179
180    this.bus.post(new GradeBookLoaded(this.book));
181
182    POASubmission submission =
183      createPOASubmission("Subject", "Unknown Student <unknown@mail.com>", LocalDateTime.now());
184    this.bus.post(new POASubmissionSelected(submission));
185
186    verify(this.view, times(2)).setSelectedStudentIndex(0);
187
188    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
189    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
190
191    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(null));
192  }
193
194  @Test
195  public void submissionWhenNoGradeBookHasBeenLoadedFiresUnknownStudentSelectedEvent() {
196    StudentSelectedEventHandler eventHandler = mock(StudentSelectedEventHandler.class);
197    this.bus.register(eventHandler);
198
199    POASubmission submission =
200      createPOASubmission("Subject", "Unknown Student <unknown@mail.com>", LocalDateTime.now());
201    this.bus.post(new POASubmissionSelected(submission));
202
203    verify(this.view, never()).setSelectedStudentIndex(any(int.class));
204
205    ArgumentCaptor<StudentSelectedEvent> event = ArgumentCaptor.forClass(StudentSelectedEvent.class);
206    verify(eventHandler).handle(event.capture());
207
208    assertThat(event.getValue().getSelectedStudent(), equalTo(null));
209  }
210
211}
